BTN.SRC2: Get facts from the source article.

MAIN.HEAD: Здоровье и Фитнес
MAIN.IMG: Apple Watch wellness and health apps

P1.HEAD: Electrolyte
P1.TEXT: Electrolytes play a vital role in maintaining homeostasis in the body. They help to regulate the heart and neurological function, fluid balance, oxygen delivery, acid-base balance, and much more.
P1.IMG: Record electrolytes and minerals with you Apple Watch
P1.DWN: Скачать бесплатное приложение Electrolyte из магазина Apple Store

P2.HEAD: Log Mass
P2.TEXT: Отслеживание массы тела повышает эффективность тренеровок и является хорошим мотиватором в достижения поставленной цели.
P2.IMG: Save body mass directly from your Apple Watch into Apple Health Storage
P2.DWN: Скачать бесплатное приложение Log Mass из магазина Apple Store

P3.HEAD: Log Vitamin
P3.TEXT: Запись дозы и времени приема витаминов. Недельная история на умных часах Apple Watch и полная синхронизация с приложением Apple Здоровье. Все очень просто и понятно, бесплатно и без реклам!
P3.IMG: Учет приема наиболее существенны витаминов непосредственно с ваших умных часов Apple Watch
P3.DWN: Скачать бесплатное приложение Log Vitamin из магазина Apple Store

P4.HEAD: Log Waist
P4.TEXT: Самый легкий способ учета окружности талии с умных часов Apple Watch. Полная синхронизация с приложением Apple Здоровье.
P4.IMG: Измерения объема талии с умных часов
P4.DWN: Скачать бесплатное приложение Log Waist из магазина Apple Store

P1.ABOUT: Electrolytes play a vital role in maintaining homeostasis in the body. They help to regulate the heart and neurological function, fluid balance, oxygen delivery, acid-base balance, and much more. Track electrolyte intake with Apple Watch App.
P1.DESC1: Regulates heart rhythm, nerve function, muscle contraction, blood pressure and sugar levels, participates in making protein, bone, and DNA. Magnesium deficiency leads to loss of appetite, nausea, vomiting, fatigue, and weakness; while high levels of it might cause Hypermagnesemia.
P1.DESC2: Helps muscles to move and nerves to carry messages between the brain and every body part. Assists blood vessels to move blood throughout the body. Participates in the release of hormones and enzymes that affect almost every function in the human body. About 99% of the body’s calcium supply is stored in the bones and teeth.
P1.DESC3: Used for almost everything in the body, including proper kidney and heart function, muscle contraction, and nerve transmission. Potassium deficiency can increase blood pressure and deplete calcium in bones.
P1.DESC4: A vital part of hemoglobin and myoglobin, proteins that carry oxygen to body tissues and muscles.  Red blood cells contain more than half of the human body iron.
P1.DESC5: Electrolyte imbalances can develop by consuming too little or too much electrolyte as well as excreting too little or too much electrolyte.

P2.DESC1: We have a responsibility to ourselves for our health.  No one can make us lose weight or choose healthy foods.  We must decide this for ourselves.
P2.DESC2: Logging our weight makes it real. While that sound strange; it’s real. This is data, recorded facts. They are real whether we record them or not.
P2.DESC3: Logging daily is important, it keeps healthy habits in front of our minds.  Every time we make a log entry, we are reminded of our commitment to health. Skipping a day here and there makes it easier to skip 2 days, then 3 days. Then, before you know it, you’ve stopped and you are back to your old habits.
P2.DESC4_2: History of past recordings with percentage difference
P2.DESC4_3: All watch sizes, all watch face complication types
P2.DESC4_4: Does not need companion iPhone app

P3.ABOUT: Сбалансированный витаминный комплекс защищает организм от окислительных процессов и преждевременного старения, способствует снижению риска различных заболеваний, увеличивает энергию и помогает избежание скачков настроения.
P3.DESC1: The application is an excellent vitamin tracker that might improve your diet and customize nutrient targets at the same time.
P3.DESC2: Wearable activity trackers offer considerable promise for helping users to adopt healthier lifestyles.
P3.DESC3: Important for normal vision, the immune system, and reproduction. Helps the heart, lungs, kidneys, and other organs work properly.
P3.DESC4: Helps to protect cells and keeps them healthy, maintains healthy skin, blood vessels, bones and cartilage. Helps with wound healing.
P3.DESC5: Regulates the amount of calcium and phosphate in the body. These nutrients are needed to keep bones, teeth and muscles healthy. A lack of vitamin D can lead to bone deformities such as rickets in children, and bone pain caused by a condition called osteomalacia in adults.
P3.DESC6: Important to vision, reproduction, and the health of your blood, brain and skin. Has antioxidant properties. The recommended daily amount of vitamin E for adults is 15 milligrams a day.
P3.DESC7: Formation of red blood cells and health of the nerve tissues. Help the body convert food (carbohydrates) into fuel (glucose), which is used to produce energy.
P3.DESC8: Helps to convert nutrients into energy and plays an important role in the health of hair, skin, and nails.
P3.DESC9: Needed to make red and white blood cells in the bone marrow, convert carbohydrates into energy, and produce DNA and RNA.
P3.DESC0: Needed to turn food into energy. It helps keep your nervous system, digestive system and skin healthy.

P4.ABOUT: Простой и удобный дневник размера тали на ваших часах Apple Watch. Не требует аккаунта и регистрации. История измерений синхронизуется с приложением Apple Здоровье, и до 7 дней храниться на часах.
P4.DESC1: Риск диабета 2 типа и сердечно сосудистых заболеваний увеличивается когда больше жира расположено в талии, а не в районе бедер.
P4.DESC2: показали, что измерения размера талии точнее прогнозируют риск заболеваний сердца чем широко используемый ИМТ (Индекс Массы Тела).
P4.DESC3: Вес может остаться неизменным при одновременном наращивании мышечной массы и избавлении от жира. Именно поэтому фигура, форма вашего тела, лучше отражает ваше здоровье.
P4.DESC4_3: Каждые лишние 5 см на талии повышают риск на 13% у женщин и 17% у мужчин вне зависимости от ИМТ (Индекс Массы Тела)
